formatted_address: Persiaran Dato' Menteri, Kota Iskandar, 79100 Iskandar Puteri, Johor, Malaysia
name: Puteri Harbour Fountain

reviews.text: They are wonderful and beautiful sites, and they are all close to each other. After visiting the picturesque and beautiful garden, there was the dancing fountain in Johor, and the view is wonderful and beautiful. I invite everyone to visit all these wonderful landmarks in Malaysia, Johor, his city, Iskandar.

The view at night is quite impressive, although it can be a bit too dark for some.

In addition to the music fountain, there are music-playing electric cars available for rent, providing extra entertainment.

This area is ideal for young families to spend time together and enjoy the ambiance.

Furthermore, there are several restaurants nearby, offering a variety of dining options.
A peaceful place to visit especially at night, with a good ambience.
A gorgeous spot down near the harbour. The dancing fountain was mesmerizing. Our kids enjoyed watching as well as getting a few splashes from the fountain. A great free attraction in the PH area.

Amazing public beach park with such a beautiful and entertaining water fountain at Puteri Harbour across Kota Iskandar. Regular park maintenance will be a great way to keep the area popular and welcoming. It's an excellent place for the public and to organize many public events.

vicinity: Persiaran Dato' Menteri, Kota Iskandar, Iskandar Puteri
